statements: UPDATE women_health_survey_data SET survey_score = 85 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE women_health_survey_data SET health_condition = 'Diabetes' WHERE country = 'USA';
UPDATE women_health_survey_data SET survey_score = 85, age = 30 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE women_health_survey_data SET health_condition = 'Heart Disease', survey_score = 70 WHERE age > 40 AND gender = 'Female';
UPDATE WomenHealthSurvey SET age = 30, questionnaire_responded = true WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE HealthImprovementPlans SET objectives = 'Improve diet and exercise routines' WHERE plan_id = 3;
UPDATE WomenHealthSurvey SET age = 30, gender = 'Female', questionnaire_responded = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE HealthImprovementPlans SET start_date = '2022-07-15', plan_name = 'Healthy Living Plan', objectives = 'Increase physical activity, improve diet' WHERE plan_id = 3;
UPDATE women_health_survey SET age = 30, health_condition = 'Hypertension' WHERE participant_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE health_factors SET factor_name = 'Diet', description = 'Nutritional habits and dietary intake' WHERE factor_id = 2;
UPDATE women_health_survey SET age = 35, health_condition = 'Diabetes' WHERE participant_name = 'Alice';

UPDATE survey_responses SET response_score = 8, response_text = 'Positive improvement in health' WHERE factor_id = (SELECT factor_id FROM health_factors WHERE factor_name = 'Sleep Quality') AND survey_id = 101;
UPDATE women_demographics SET education_level = 'Bachelor's Degree' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE survey_responses SET question = 'How satisfied are you with our services?' WHERE respondent_id = 101;
UPDATE women_demographics SET ethnicity = 'Asian' WHERE age > 25;
UPDATE health_records SET diagnosis_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE condition = 'Diabetes';
UPDATE survey_responses SET response='Agree' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE users SET age=30, email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE survey_responses SET response='Yes' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE user_id=2;
